organization_name.name: organization_name
organization_name.description: Your organization name. This identifies the billing context for the API operation and represents a security boundary for SaladCloud resources. The organization must be created before using the API, and you must be a member of the organization.

page_size.name: page_size
page_size.description: The number of items per page

project_name.name: project_name
project_name.description: Your project name. This represents a collection of related SaladCloud resources. The project must be created before using the API.

queue_job_id.name: queue_job_id
queue_job_id.description: The job identifier. This is automatically generated and assigned when the job is created.

type.description: The URI reference that identifies the problem type

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

instance.description: The URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem

country_codes.description: List of countries nodes must be located in. Remove this field to permit nodes from any country.

ContainerGroupList.description: Represents a list of container groups

CreateContainerGroup.description: Represents a request to create a container group

country_codes.description: List of countries nodes must be located in. Remove this field to permit nodes from any country.

UpdateContainerGroup.description: Represents a request to update a container group

country_codes.description: List of countries nodes must be located in. Remove this field to permit nodes from any country.

UpdateContainerGroupNetworking.description: Represents update container group networking parameters

ContainerGroupStartupProbe.description: Represents the container group startup probe

ContainerGroupLivenessProbe.description: Represents the container group liveness probe

ContainerGroupReadinessProbe.description: Represents the container group readiness probe

WorkloadErrorList.description: Represents a list of workload errors

QueueJobList.description: Represents a list of queue jobs

id.description: The queue identifier. This is automatically generated and assigned when the queue is created.

name.description: The queue name. This must be unique within the project.

display_name.description: The display name. This may be used as a more human-readable name.

description.description: The description. This may be used as a space for notes or other information about the queue.

create_time.description: The date and time the queue was created.

update_time.description: The date and time the queue was last updated.

CreateQueue.description: Represents a request to create a new queue.

name.description: The queue name. This must be unique within the project.

display_name.description: The display name. This may be used as a more human-readable name.

description.description: The description. This may be used as a space for notes or other information about the queue.

UpdateQueue.description: Represents a request to update an existing queue.

display_name.description: The display name. This may be used as a more human-readable name.

description.description: The description. This may be used as a space for notes or other information about the queue.

input.description: The job input. May be any valid JSON.

output.description: The job output. May be any valid JSON.

QueueJobEvent.description: Represents an event for queue job

CreateQueueJob.description: Represents a request to create a queue job

input.description: The job input. May be any valid JSON.

command.description: Pass a command (and optional arguments) to override the ENTRYPOINT and CMD of a container image.
Pass a command (and optional arguments) to override the ENTRYPOINT and CMD of a container image.

ContainerGroupInstanceStatusCount.description: Represents a container group instance status count

ContainerGroupInstance.description: Represents the details of a single container group instance

state.description: The state of the container group instance

update_time.description: The UTC date & time when the workload on this machine transitioned to the current state

version.description: The version of the running container group

ready.description: Specifies whether the container group instance is currently passing its readiness check. If no readiness probe is defined, is true once fully started.

started.description: Specifies whether the container group instance passed its startup probe. Is always true when no startup probe is defined.

ContainerGroupInstances.description: Represents a list of container group instances

prices.description: The list of prices for each container group priority

is_high_demand.description: Whether the GPU class is in high demand

GpuClassesList.description: Represents a list of GPU classes

GpuClassPrice.description: Represents the price of a GPU class for a given container group priority

create_time.description: The time the resource was created

update_time.description: The time the resource was last updated

description.description: a brief description of the inference endpoint

endpoint_url.description: The URL of the inference endpoint

readme.description: A markdown file containing a detailed description of the inference endpoint

icon_image.description: The URL of the icon image

InferenceEndpointsList.description: Represents a list of inference endpoints

InferenceEndpointJobList.description: Represents a list of inference endpoint jobs

input.description: The job input. May be any valid JSON.

output.description: The job output. May be any valid JSON.

InferenceEndpointJobEvent.description: Represents an event for inference endpoint job

CreateInferenceEndpointJob.description: Represents a request to create a inference endpoint job

input.description: The job input. May be any valid JSON.

instance_prompt.description: The prompt with identifier specifying the instance, e.g. 'photo of a TOK dog', 'in the style of TOK'

instance_images.description: List of accessible image URLs to be used as instance images.

class_preset.description: One of the image class presets provided by the API.

class_images.description: List of accessible image URLs to be used as class images. Only required for Prior Preservation.

class_prompt.description: The prompt to specify images in the same class as provided instance images.

with_prior_preservation.description: Flag to add prior preservation loss.

prior_loss_weight.description: The weight of prior preservation loss.

resolution.description: The resolution for input images, all the images in the train/validation dataset will be resized to this resolution

center_crop.description: Whether to center crop the input images to the resolution. If not set, the images will be randomly cropped. The images will be resized to the resolution first before cropping.

train_text_encoder.description: Whether to train the text encoder along with the model.

max_train_steps.description: Total number of training steps to perform.

learning_rate.description: Initial learning rate (after the potential warmup period) to use.

scale_lr.description: Scale the learning rate by gradient accumulation steps and batch size.

lr_warmup_steps.description: Number of steps for the warmup in the lr scheduler.

lr_num_cycles.description: Number of hard resets of the lr in cosine_with_restarts scheduler.

use_8bit_adam.description: Whether or not to use 8-bit Adam from bitsandbytes.

adam_beta1.description: The beta1 parameter for the Adam optimizer.

adam_beta2.description: The beta2 parameter for the Adam optimizer.

adam_weight_decay.description: Weight decay to use for the model params.

adam_epsilon.description: Epsilon value for the Adam optimizer.

text_encoder_use_attention_mask.description: Whether to use attention mask for text encoder.

class_labels_conditioning.description: The optional `class_label` conditioning to pass to the unet

rank.description: The dimension of the LoRA update matrices.

train_batch_size.description: Batch size for the training dataloader.

DreamboothSD15TrainingJob.description: Job input schema for Dreambooth Training API - Stable Diffusion 1.5

CreateDreamboothSD15TrainingJob.description: Create a job for Dreambooth Training API - Stable Diffusion 1.5

DreamboothSD15TrainingJobList.description: List of jobs for Dreambooth Training API - Stable Diffusion 1.5
